ygData.subject: Re: days played
ygData.messageBody:
hehe...i hit 46 last night, <and wouldn't you know i joined a group for fear
right after that, and it broke up...didn't even get to go to the portal ): >
and the last time i checked my played, it was something like 49 days.....boy am
i way behind....of course, there is that factor that i die alot......hmmm.....o
wel, in any case, i believe that's a very good accomplishment getting to 20
that fast...i can't remember how many total hours it took me....

(\/)ystix Spellchaser
lv 46 human cleric of The Rathe

Mike Schlagenhauf wrote:

> From: "Mike Schlagenhauf" <trelane@...>
>
> Last nite I just hit 19, and just at 6 days played. Not to mention I've
> spent a good 6 hours minimum in auctioning off things and buying things.
> With that 6 hours, I'd probably be halfway to 20. :)
>
> -- Lohre
> Ambassador of Lifeforce Brigade
> Bristlebane Server
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: KAUFFMAN,ROBERT (HP-FtCollins,ex1) <robert_kauffman@...>
> To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
> Sent: Monday, August 02, 1999 10:06 AM
> Subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] days played
>

> <robert_kauffman@...>

> > Karlan, the first player to reach 50 was able to get another character to
> 50
> > in 17 days played. I'm pretty sure the first 20 levels took him no time
> at
> > all.
> >
> > Fidan

> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: rpeiper@... [mailto:rpeiper@...]

> > To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> > Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] days played

> > From: rpeiper@...
> >
> >
> > My top character is level 16 (well 15 now, but that is a long
> > story..
> > he WAS 16) and made that in under 6 game days. A good deal of that was
> spent
> > dying and wandering. If I concentrate on him he should hit 20 in 10 game
> > days
> > easily and I would hardly consider myself experienced. I would bet a
> > twinked,
> > power leveled character can hit 20 in 5 days or less. I have a friend who
> > hit
> > 20 in 6 days with his Barbarian Warrior.
